                            Integer platform)
        Get the detail information of the song.

        Get the detail information of the song.

        Specified by:
        getDetailSong in interface SongService
        Parameters:
        ids - The song mid.
        platform - The platform this song belongs to.
        Returns:
        Detail song, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is subclass of BasicSong.

      • getSimilarSongs

        public List<? extends BasicSong> getSimilarSongs(String songId,
                                                 Integer songType,
                                                 Integer platform)
        Return a list of similar song with songId.

        Return a list of similar song with songId.

        Specified by:
        getSimilarSongs in interface SongService
        Parameters:
        songId - The song id.
        songType - The pms song type, only used in pms platform.
        platform - The platform the song belongs to.
        Returns:
        A list of similar songs with songId.

      • getLyrics

        public BasicLyrics getLyrics(Long id,
                             Integer platform)
        Get the lyrics of the song with id.

        Get the lyrics of the song with id.

        Specified by:
        getLyrics in interface SongService
        Parameters:
        id - The id of song.
        platform - The platform this song belongs to.
        Returns:

      • getSongsLink

        public Result getSongsLink(String ids,
                           String level,
                           Integer platform)
        Get the songs' links.

        Get the songs' links.

        Specified by:
        getSongsLink in interface SongService
        Parameters:
        ids - The song's id, multiple songs id separated with comma, in bilibili, ids == bvid:cid.
        level - Quality of song, include standard, higher, exhigh, lossless, hires, jyeffect, sky, jymaster.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        The urls of your songs with ids ids, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is Map<String,String> (qqmusic and ncm platform) or BiliLinksDTO (bilibili platform), single song link in pms platform.

      • searchResourcesByKeyword

        public Result searchResourcesByKeyword(String keyword,
                                       Integer pageNo,
                                       Integer pageSize,
                                       Integer type,
                                       Integer platform)
        Search resources of type type by keyword.

        Search resources of type type by keyword.

        Specified by:
        searchResourcesByKeyword in interface SongService
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search.
        pageNo - The page number.
        pageSize - The page size.
        type - The type of the searched resources.
        platform - The platform id.
        Returns:
        Searched resources wrapped by Result DTO, the data is PagedDataDTO<T>.
